text_importexport_content: Apha ungangenisa kwaye uthumele ngaphandle izikhumbuzo zakho.
text_notifications1: Izaziso mazenziwe ukuba zisebenzise esi sicelo:
text_help_content1: Isikhumbuzi sokukhiya sisicelo esithumela izaziso ngexesha elichaziweyo lexesha.
text_help_content2: Ukongeza isikhumbuzi esitsha, cinezela kwi icon "plus". Emva koko, hlela imihlaba yokubhaliweyo kwaye ufake isihloko sesaziso, ixesha lokuphumla (ngemizuzwana), isicatshulwa esiza kubakho kumzimba wesaziso, kunye ne-URL ye icon.
text_help_content3: Xa usetyenziso lusebenza kwisikhangeli, isikhangeli sinokukhubaza izaziso ukuba usetyenziso aluvulekanga kwithebhu esebenzayo. Ukuba usetyenziso belufakiwe, isixhobo sakho sinokulurhoxisa usetyenziso, ngakumbi ukuba ibhetri yefowuni yakho iphantsi. Ke sebenzisa le sicelo ukuba inokuba loluphi na uncedo kuwe, kodwa ungayisebenziseli nantoni na ebalulekileyo.
text_help_content5: Ukungenisa ngaphakathi okanye ukuthumela ngaphandle izikhumbuzo, cofa kwi icon yokungenisa / ukuthumela ngaphandle. Xa ungenisa izikhumbuzi kwifayile, izikhumbuzo zangoku ziya kucinywa kwaye zibhalwe ngaphezulu.
text_help_content6: Isikhumbuzi esivulekileyo sisicelo seWebhu esiqhubela phambili, oko kuthetha ukuba siyasebenza ngaphakathi kwisikhangeli. Xa uyifaka, ngelixa izinto zebrawuza zingaboniswanga, iqhubeka ngaphakathi kwisikhangeli. Izikhumbuzi zigcinwa kugcino lwasekhaya lwebrawuza yedomain yesikhumbuzi.marcoparrone.com. Indawo yogcino isebenza kakuhle kunye nezikhangeli zeChannel, Edge kunye neFirefox. Ezinye iibrawuza zinokucima ugcino lwasekhaya emva kwexesha elithile. I-Android ngokungagqibekanga isebenzisa i-Chrome, iWindows ngokungagqibekanga isebenzisa i-Edge. Isikhumbuzi sokujikeleza okwangoku asixhaswanga kwiimveliso zeApple. Ngenjongo yokunceda ukukhusela ilahleko yezikhumbuzi, kucetyiswa ukuba wenze ukhuphelo usebenzisa "ukuthunyelwa ngaphandle" kokusebenza, ngalo lonke ixesha usenza uhlengahlengiso ongafuni kulahleka.
text_about_content3: I-SOFTWARE IBONELELWA "NJENGOKO INJALO", NGAPHANDLE KWESIQINISEKISO SALO LONKE IINTLOBO, UKUCHAZA OKANYE OKUFAKANISIWEYO, KUBANDAKANYWA KODWA AKUKHO MALI KWIZIQINISEKISO ZOKUTHENGISA, UKULUNGELELA INJONGO ETHILE NOKUNGABONI. AKUKHO NTSHINTSHO ABABHALI OKANYE ABAPHATHI BAMALUNGELO OKWENZA ILungelo LOKWENZA ILungelo LOKWENZA ILungelo LOKWENZA IBANGO, UKONAKALISEKA OKANYE OLUNYE UXanduva, UKUBA KUKWENZIWA KWESIVUMELWANO, TORT OKANYE NGOKUNYE OKUQHELEKILEYO, OKUQHUBEKILEYO OKANYE NGOKUQHUBANA NESOFTWARE OKANYE UKUSETYENZISWA KANYE NEZINYE IZINTO EZENZIWAYO ISoftware.
text_about_content4: LENKONZO INGABA NEZINGUQUKO EZIXHASWA YI-GOOGLE. UGOOGLE ULAWULA ZONKE IZIQINISEKISO ZOKUNXULUMANA NOKUTSHINTSHA, UKUCHAZA OKANYE OKUFUNYANISIWEYO, KUFUNYANWA NASIPHI ISIQINISEKISO SOKUCHANEKA, UKUTHEMBEKA, KUNYE NAZO ZONKE IZIQINISEKISO ZOKWENZA UMSEBENZI, UKULUNGELELA INJONGO ETHILE NOKUNGABONI.
text_about_content5: Le app yewebhu iguqulelwe ukulungiselela wena usebenzisa isoftware yokuguqulela exhaswa nguToliko lukaGoogle. Iinzame ezisengqiqweni zenziwe ukubonelela ngoguqulelo oluchanekileyo, nangona kunjalo, akukho nguqulelo ezenzekelayo engagqibelelanga kwaye ayenzelwanga ukubuyisela abaguquleli abangabantu. Iinguqulelo zinikezelwa njengenkonzo kubasebenzisi bewebhusayithi ye marcoparrone.com, kwaye zinikezelwa "njengoko kunjalo." Akukho waranti yalo naluphi na uhlobo, nokuba ichaziwe okanye icacisiwe, yenziwa ngokuchaneka, ukuthembeka, okanye ukuchaneka kwazo naziphi na iinguqulelo ezenziwe ngesiNgesi kulo naluphi na olunye ulwimi. Eminye imixholo (enjengemifanekiso, iividiyo, iFlash, njl. Njl.) Ayinakho ukuguqulelwa ngokuchanekileyo ngenxa yemida yesoftware yokuguqulela.
text_about_content6: Isicatshulwa esisemthethweni yinguqulelo yesiNgesi yewebhusayithi. Nakuphi na ukungangqinelani okanye iyantlukwano edalwe kuguqulelo ayibopheleli kwaye ayinampembelelo yomthetho yokuthotyelwa okanye yokunyanzeliswa. Ukuba kukho nayiphi na imibuzo enxulumene nokuchaneka kolwazi oluqulathwe kwiwebhusayithi eguqulweyo, bhekisa kwinguqulelo yesiNgesi yewebhusayithi leyo eluhlobo olusemthethweni.
